A4.text: The Desert Botanical Garden has more than 50,000 plants in more than 4,000 taxa, one-third of which are native to the area.

A5.text: It has rich collections of agave (4,026 plants in 248 taxa) and cacti (13,973 plants in 1,320 taxa), especially the Opuntia sub-family.
